Well, everything is possible, really, but this would essentially be reinven=
ting the browser.  Performance-wise, it would probably be dog-slow without =
reinvesting the years of effort that went into current browsers implementat=
ions.  Also, most clients wanting native apps do so because they feel that =
a web app would feel alien or be less visible.  I can tell that we have mad=
e applications in the past which could have been better served by a web app=
 (or as well as); but don't forget the marketing aspect of being "on the ap=
p store".  The nature of the beast is that clients as much as users prefer =
native application to web apps in most cases.
